examples.example: 我们必须努力奋斗，才能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: We must strive hard in order to realize our own dreams.

examples.example: 我们在生活中必须保持乐观积极的心态，才能更好地面对各种挑战。

translate.english: We must maintain an optimistic and positive attitude in life in order to better face various challenges.

examples.example: 我们每个人都必须为自己的行为负责，这样才能成为更好的人。

translate.english: Each of us must be responsible for our own actions so that we can become better people.
